document_data.name: Grigor Hulmaster
document_data.mainbody:
'''Grigor Hulmaster''' was once the Harmach (lord) of [[Hulburg]].

Grigor was forced into exile in [[Thentia]] by the [[shadowmage]] [[Rhovann]] and the merchant council of [[Hulburg]]. He was assassinated by [[Cyric]]ists in [[1480 DR]].

Grigor was [[Geran Hulmaster]]'s uncle.
